mdRecord.dcterms:title: A fac simile of the original rough draft of the Declaration of Independence / the body of the work in the hand writing of Thomas Jefferson ; alterations in the hands of John Adams and Benjamin Franklin. ; Also, a fac simile of the signatures thereto.
Facsimile of the original rough draft of the Declaration of Independence
United States. Declaration of Independence
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text of the Declaration printed in 3 columns at the top of the page; below are two columnes discussing the history behind the writing of the Declaration, separated by a panel containing the facsimile signatures.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection. Deposit of Albert H. Small, July 14, 2003.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States.--Declaration of Independence
